briefTitle: SGLT2 Inhibition and Stimulation of Endogenous Glucose Production: Protocol 2

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* T2DM subjects
* 18 - 70 yrs old
* BMI = 25-45 kg/m2
* Must be on a stable dose (more than 3 months) of monotherapy or combination therapy with metformin and/or a sulfonylurea
* HbA1c \<10.0%
* Stable body weight (Â± 3 lbs) over preceding 3 months
* Do not participate in excessively heavy exercise

Exclusion Criteria:

* Subjects taking drugs known to affect glucose metabolism (other than metformin and sulfonylurea)
* Individuals with evidence of proliferative diabetic retinopathy, plasma creatinine \>1.4 females or \>1.5 males, or 24-hour urine albumin excretion \> 300 mg

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Plasma Glucose Concentration
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline to the last hour of the study (240-300 minutes) in plasma glucose concentration

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Endogenous Glucose Production (EGP)
outcomeMeasures.description: The change in endogenous glucose production is measured from baseline until the last hour of the study

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Plasma Insulin During Measurement of EGP
outcomeMeasures.description: Measurement of change in plasma insulin concentration during measurement of of EGP from baseline to last hour of the study

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Glucagon During EGP Measurement
outcomeMeasures.description: Measurement of change in glucagon during EGP measurement from baseline to the last hour of the study
